::Zardus/Perndabot::

Zardus dives as he sees Hades' shots heading for him, managing to esape them 
but being hit by some of Unitron's shots. His eyes widen as an autogun swirls 
to fire at him.

Zardus rolls out of the way of the shot as he lands, firing his launcher and 
gun at Unitron.

"Liono," he yells as he shoots at Unitron, "Tell the autoguns to hold their 
fire, they're not helping!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot rolls sharply to the left, the blast hitting his right leg. He 
growls, jumping back and firing again at Sixshot.
